mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (mno, mid, mname, mpw, mnick, mmail, mhp, htel, haddr) values (seq_member.nextval, #{mid}, #{mname}, #{mpw}, #{mnick}, #{mmail}, #{mhp}, #{htel}, #{haddr})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set mid=#{mid}, mname=#{mname}, mpw=#{mpw}, mnick=#{mnick}, mmail=#{mmail}, mhp=#{mhp}, htel=#{htel}, haddr=#{haddr} where mno=#{mno}
mapper.select: select* from (select rownum rno, mno, mid, mname, mpw, mnick, mmail, mhp, mh, htel, haddr, regdate from tbl_member where rownum>0) order by mno desc

select mno, mid, mname, mpw, mmail, mhp, mnick, mh, htel, haddr, regdate from ( select rownum rno, mno, mid, mname, mpw, mnick, mmail, mhp, mh, htel, haddr, regdate from tbl_member where mno > 0 and rownum <= #{page} * 10 order by mno desc ) where rno > (#{page} - 1) * 10
select count(*) from tbl_member where mno > 0

select mno, mid, mname, mpw, mmail, mhp, mnick, mh, htel, haddr, regdate from ( select rownum rno, mno, mid, mname, mpw, mnick, mmail, mhp, mh, htel, haddr, regdate from tbl_member where mno > 0
and rownum <= (1) * 10 order by mno desc ) where rno > (1-1) * 10
select count(*) from tbl_member where mno > 0
select fullName from tbl_attach where mno = #{mno} order by regdate
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach (fullName, mno) values (#{imgname}, seq_member.currval)
mapper.select: select mid, mpw, mname from tbl_member where mid=#{mid} and mpw=#{mpw}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set sessionKey=#{sessionId}, sessionLimit=#{next} where mid=#{mid}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where sessionKey=#{value} and sessionLimit > sysdate

if.if: and (mid like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR mname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR mnick like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
